title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 187.9 - Retention of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 187.9 - Retention of records

State Regulations

Department records shall be maintained for the retention
periods established for each class of records pursuant to the provisions of

Arts and Cultural Affairs Law, section 57.05, and Part 188 of this Title. No
record shall be knowingly destroyed or transferred from the custody of the
department during the pendency of an application for access or for the
amendment or correction of such record made pursuant to Public Officers Law, article 6 or 6-A. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
187.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
